title: Double notification sounds - what config change did I need to do again?
body:
Hi, long time Teams for Linux user here (love it! <3), but I recently reinstalled my system including the home partition, and Teams' config.json was something I forgot to backup.

Could someone please remind me how to avoid the annoying double notification sound at a fraction of a second one from another?

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/62908d8f-c750-403e-b525-c307fb7ef7b6)

Thanks :)
